unnormalised: Really enjoy these athlete bios! Knowing Sachin Tendulkar's early days, or Mary Kom's struggles in Manipur, is inspiring. Remember "Chak De! India"? These are real-life versions. I hope you'll feature someone from IIT sports next. Maybe a kabaddi player from Haryana or someone who broke records at the National Games in Kerala. Jai Hind!
